## ROCme

<br>

#### This App is a Tool to Analyse Binay Classification Results

<br>

+ **Global Metrics** - Diagnost the ROC Curves, Predictions Distribution, and Prediction Buckets

+ **Local Metrics** Interactively Modify the Descision Threshold and Analyse Precision, Recall, Accuracy etc.


<br><br>

#### Current performance metrics included:

  * AUC Plots & Scores  
  * Predictions Distributions  
  * Sensitivity
  * Specificity
  * Precision
  * Recall
  * Balanced_accuracy
